24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88:
Here is a summary of the article:

President Bush had a colonoscopy at Camp David, during which doctors removed 5 small polyps from his colon. Fortunately, none of the polyps were found to be worrisome. Bush is reportedly in good spirits and will resume his activities at Camp David. This is not the first time Bush has had polyps removed, as he has had similar procedures during past colonoscopies before he became president.
42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4:
Here is a summary of the article:

Daniel Radcliffe, who starred in the Harry Potter film series, has turned 18 and gained access to his £20 million fortune, which was previously held in a trust fund. Despite his newfound wealth, Radcliffe has stated that he won't be extravagant and wants to avoid the "kid star goes off the rails" image. He plans to celebrate his birthday with a party, but has expressed a desire to maintain a responsible and humble attitude as he moves forward with his career, which is branching out into other movies beyond the Potter franchise.
